title: I wonder how Lebron's doing?
content: Lebron seemed to be pretty upset after the recent loss agains the bulls, maybe he is injured or unhappy with his performance

title: Miami did great this year
content: I think the Heat did very well to get to the finals, this year, they weren't so good  during a long time...
